name: couchdb-howler
description: Use web sockets to subscribe to CouchDB global changes
author: Geoffrey Cox

scripts.compile-test: babel src -d cache/compiled/src && babel test -d cache/compiled/test
scripts.diff-for-assert: if [ "$(diff lib/ cache/compiled/src)" != "" ]; then echo 'Error: you need to execute "npm run compile"'; exit 1; fi
scripts.assert-compiled: npm run compile-for-assert && npm run diff-for-assert
scripts.node-test: npm run compile && mocha --require babel-core/register test/node.js
scripts.node-full-test: npm run compile && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha test/node.js
scripts.browser-test-firefox: npm run compile-test && node_modules/gofur/scripts/browser/test.js -c cache -t cache/compiled/test/browser.js -b selenium:firefox
scripts.browser-test-chrome: npm run compile-test && node_modules/gofur/scripts/browser/test.js -c cache -t cache/compiled/test/browser.js -b selenium:chrome
scripts.browser-test-phantomjs: npm run compile-test && node_modules/gofur/scripts/browser/test.js -c cache -t cache/compiled/test/browser.js -b selenium:phantomjs
npm run compile-test && node_modules/gofur/scripts/browser/test.js -c cache -t cache/compiled/test/browser.js -b selenium:phantomjs
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run node-full-test
